summary: Naples is a major city in Italy, the third largest after Rome and Milan. Founded by Greeks over 2,500 years ago, it's one of the world's oldest cities. It was once the capital of the Kingdom of Naples and has a rich history, influencing art, music, and cuisine. Known for its historic center (a UNESCO World Heritage Site), delicious food (including pizza), and nearby ancient ruins like Pompeii, Naples is a key cultural and economic hub in southern Italy.
title: Naples
